content: this warm snuggly cowl was designed to showcase the cloud or rope yarn from white gum wools it uses a single 150g ball of the super bulky yarn it is very quick to make with testers saying it took between 50 to 90 minutes to make the whole cowl it uses back loop single_crochet stitches to provide texture it can be made with solid colours vareigated yarns or the gradient cakes dyed by changeling coloured yarns
